text: Judo at the 2019 European Youth Summer Olympic Festival was held at the Heydar Aliyev Arena, Baku, Azerbaijan, from 24 to 27 July 2019. ==Medalists== ===Boys=== {| |- |rowspan=2|−50 kgBoys −50
